label: 本郡
本: Court and Bakufu in Japan:  Essays in Kamakura History . Stanford University Press . 1982
説明文: One of the units, along with gō and ho, comprising the public land sector ↓(kokugaryō) in the provinces in medieval times. Hongōri were usually centered around the old administrative bases of the districts (kōri) into which ritsuryō-era provinces had been divided.　[郷、保、国衙領、郡、律令]
